title: Gorilla Waterproof Patch & Seal Tape, 4" x 8', Clear, (Pack of 1)
description: Gorilla Waterproof Patch & Seal Tape Clear instantly seals out water, air, and moisture. With an extra thick adhesive layer and UV resistant backing this tape conforms to form a permanent bond indoors and out. At 4" wide use it to patch holes, cracks, gaps and tears, even underwater. Excellent for Home, Auto, Marine, Camping, RVs, Outdoors, and more!
